main event: A civilian in Dayton, Ohio observed a round, reddish object for 11 minutes, resembling a big star, and probably saw a jet aircraft with afterburner in short operation.
interesting points: The object was described as round, reddish, and similar to a big star, with no sound.
The witness was a retired insurance worker with some special educational training in art and insurance.
The witness reported that it was not the first time they had seen a similar object, with a previous sighting in 1952 in Daytona of a fast-moving object climbing straight up and gaining speed.
The witness estimated the speed of the object to be very fast, and placed it very high up in the sky.
The witness mentioned that the object was an observed phenomena of an unidentified flying object and could not account for it within the limitations of their own vocabulary and observations.
sighted object: Round reddish object resembling a big star
